channel.title: Services on Project CADI
channel.description: Recent content in Services on Project CADI

item.title: Hands Free Calling
item.description: I’m hoping to be able to activate the hands-free protocols on Bluetooth to allow conversations through the car speakers.

item.title: Music Playback
item.description: I don’t just want to play music, I plan to show song info and allow playback control over Bluetooth with audio through the car speakers.

item.title: Environmental Control
item.description: Automated A/C Control based on outside (and inside) temperatures, with support for headed seats

item.title: Radio
item.description: Support for radio tuning with tuner

item.title: CAN bus
item.description: CAN bus integration to support virtual engine gauges and other diagnostics and integrations

item.title: Remote Locks
item.description: Replace my keyless entry with a fob I can customize

item.title: Remote Start
item.description: App or Secure key-fob based remote start functions would be awesome
